record.jsxtip: Fires after the user changes the value of this file picker. Canceling this event prevents the change from occurring.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user types text in the file field and before the change is committed. Canceling this event prevents committing the input.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxreturntext: specifies the parsed file, in which case the input text is not parsed by the file format.

record.jsxtext: the text entered by the user.
record.jsxreturntext: modifies the text entered by the user before it is parsed by the file format.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this file picker loses focus.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this file picker gains focus.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user right-clicks this file picker and before the bound context menu displays. Canceling this event prevents the menu from displaying.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxreturntext: use this field to override the default menu with an instance of jsx3.gui.Menu.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this file picker is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this file picker before it is removed from the DOM.
